title: Funnydruids
author: Funnydruids
content: Hi forum! Hope you doing great. as topic says...Anyone knows where to buy virtual mastercard or visa and use on PayPal?Thanks and have a great life.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: I think many peoples are looking for that lol. In the beginning, when I create a PayPal account I feel I need something like this. But I don't think PayPal will accept virtual cards (but I am not sure). Because I had tried with Payoneer virtual card and hard card, but both have been declined. That's why I doubt PayPal will accept the virtual card. Hope experienced users who are familiar with PayPal lately will share more details if possible using virtual cards for PayPal. I tried it a long time ago, but I am not aware of any recent changes. But, be careful from scammers, they would DM you for cards, etc. Don't trust anyone if they don't have a good record on the forum.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: That's one of the drawbacks of Paypal users,s, especially in a country where the majority of the people do not have the capacity or are having a hard time getting a MasterCard, check this website for a compilation of the sites where you can get yourself virtual master card or visa card that you can use for on Paypal some with small fee others are freeVirtual Credit Cards for Paypal Verification
